reviewText: Got this as a gift for a family member. They asked for the Cotton Club. They are going to get a couple of bonus movies as well. Hope they like it.  Shipping was fast.

The rating reflects a flaw in the description of the discs. It lists them as widescreen, but in fact, Breathless is full frame. I bought this a year and a half ago and brought it to the sellers attention then. Unfortunately, they won't take back an opened disc, so I was stuck with it, even though I only bought if for the widescreen presentation of Breathless. The good news is the Breathless is being released in April on bluray, I should have waited.

I bought 11 DVDs on ebay at the same time as I bought these. They only cost $20 for 11 and arrived before Xmas. These took 7 seven weeks longer to arrive and each DVD cost $20.- so expensive for such bad service.  I will never shop amazon again
DVD arrived in fine shape n plays fine.
This collection is just what you'd like in your video library all that are Richard Gere fans.
